import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { FaGithub, FaFacebook, FaLinkedin, FaGlobe } from 'react-icons/fa'; import './AboutPage.css'; function AboutPage() { const [flippedCards, setFlippedCards] = useState({ about: false, usage: false, creator: false, tech: false }); const [hoveredCard, setHoveredCard] = useState(null); const [isDealing, setIsDealing] = useState(true); const [isMagicActive, setIsMagicActive] = useState(false); const toggleCard = (card) => { setFlippedCards(prev => ({ ...prev, [card]: !prev[card] })); setIsMagicActive(true); setTimeout(() => setIsMagicActive(false), 1000); }; useEffect(() => { const timer = setTimeout(() => setIsDealing(false), 1000); return () => clearTimeout(timer); }, []); return (
